name: draft-queue-discord-bot
description: Organizes draft queues in a Discord server

scripts.start: npm run lint && tsc && node server.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run testWindows
scripts.testWindows: SET TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json&& mocha -P test -r ts-node/register test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.testUnix: npm run lint && TS_NODE_PROJECT='test/tsconfig.json' mocha -P test -r ts-node/register **/*.spec.ts
